# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.MONITOR property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

MONITOR/MWAIT. A value of true indicates the processor supports this technology.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: MONITOR
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean
